def solve(arr1, arr2):
    sorted_arr1 = sorted(arr1)
    sorted_arr2 = sorted(arr2)
    min_sum = 0
    for i in range(len(arr1)):
        min_sum += abs(sorted_arr1[i] - sorted_arr2[i])
    return min_sum

def solve(arr1, arr2):
    arr1.sort()
    arr2.sort()
    sum_diff = 0
    for i in range(len(arr1)):
        sum_diff += abs(arr1[i] - arr2[i])
    return sum_diff
